alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 3:06PM CST until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River near Joslin affecting Rock Island, Henry IL and Whiteside Counties. Rock River at Moline affecting Rock Island and Henry IL Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rock River near Joslin. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Water affects residences in the Thompson addition. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM CST Monday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 15.0 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
